entity.name: Good Morning Britain
entity.description: Good morning, Britain. Up early and need to catch up on the latest news, weather and sports? Then this weekday morning programme is for you, offering the latest information in such areas as entertainment, health and money. `Good Morning Britain' is the typical morning news and talk show. It features a number of presenters, correspondents and reporters covering what you should know to start your day before heading out the door.

text:
Do you live in an area at risk of flooding?‚òîÔ∏è

You don't have to be next to a river or the sea. Flooding can come from different sources so be #FloodAware by checking your risk at https://t.co/TfMNGBSfGK

Follow @LDN_Environment & @envagencySE 

#FloodActionWeek #LDNFloodAware https://t.co/3A4cS4Y0FX

urls.title: Guest blog - 100 acres of Bog, Heath and Grassland destroyed by tree-planting, by Miles King - Mark Avery
urls.description: Miles King has written regularly on this site. His previous blogs and more information about him can be found here. Twitter: @MilesKing10 Berrier Farm under Trees: 100 acres of Bog, Heath and Grassland destroyed by tree-planting. England desperately needs more trees, we are constantly told. And it‚Äôs certainly true that tree cover here is lower than most other European countries. The data must be handled with care though, when tree cover can include anything from Eucalyptus plantations in Spain, to Sitka
